title: User Directory
summary: Find and view entire employee directory at once to have quick access to their information.

title: Weather Dashboard
summary: The weather dashboard that will run in the browser and feature dynamically weather updates, which will allow users to view current weather in their city.

title: Eat-Da-Burger
summary: A restaurant app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd wish to eat. You have the option to save a burger later or devour it.
